channel.title: Help with some easy 317 stuff
channel.description:
i need help on
1. how to add that u cant log out in combat?
2. how can u add that u cant teleport in combat?
3. how to make certain npc's aggresive?
4. how to make the logout button in top off the client like the others instead off this pic Smiley
[img]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt292/kneistol/1270010004.png[/img]
if u cant see the text it says
: how can i do so i can see running steps,logout button,prayer and hp in the corner and instead off down onn the inventory the logout button will be at the corner?
